channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Van Toan (vtoan). I am working as an embedded software engineer in automotive field. I’m really into programming in tight, resource-limited environments, so I’ve been diving into the basics like logic gates (even though I might never actually use them, haha). I want to build my technical skills from the ground up with a solid foundation in fundamental engineering. Check out my notebook here.
